transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. Hello. Good morning sir, main Aman baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke side log department se. Sir IndiaMART ke andar kar rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Haan. Sir actually aapka number ye kisi aur firm ke sath bhi register hai kya Chirag General Store karke?
Customer: Aapki aawaz kat rahi hai, kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu aapka ye wala jo list number se aapne mujhe call kiya hai ye kisi Chirag General Store se bhi connected hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay okay. Sir ye mere paas mein show kar raha tha. Main isliye confirm kar raha tha ki matlab kahan se kaun se firm se call aa rahi hai. Ji sir aapne call ki thi mujhe bataiye sir.
Customer: Wo na wo usme account close karwana tha uska.
Executive: Ye wala account close karwana hai?
Customer: Nahi ye wala nahi dusra wala tha ek, ek aur tha. Bhatia Trading ke naam se.
Executive: Sir kaun sa mujhe bata sakte hain thoda sa naam vagaira?
Customer: Bhatia Trading ke naam se tha mobile number us pe 978 wala number tha.
Executive: Ek second sir mujhe number confirm kijiye.
Customer: Haan. 97
Executive: 978
Executive: 978
Executive: 330
Executive: 330
Executive: 6006
Executive: 6006 ye number hai aur company ka kya naam tha uska Bhatia?
Customer: Bhatia Trading company Bhatia Trading establishment.
Executive: Trading?
Customer: Establishment.
Executive: Establishment. Haan.
Executive: Theek hai main isko check karke ek baar confirm karta hu aap please line pe rahiyega ek minute. Ji.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Sir ye wala account already disable chal raha hai apna to mujhe ek cheez janni thi sir aapse ki matlab ye kyun band karna chahte hain aap isko thoda sa reason bata sakte hain sir?
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir aap is wale account ko kyun band karna chahte hain?
Customer: Ye isliye to close karaya abhi.
Executive: Haan main wahi matlab reason puch raha hu matlab isko properly aap band kar rahe hain matlab kya reason aa raha hai koi dikkat aa rahi hai kya is wale account mein?
Customer: Sir actually kya hai ye firm jo hai wo abhi close ho gayi hai.
Executive: Okay okay ye reason hai. Sir ye IndiaMART ke andar to already disable hi sir bhai ye wala account to aapka.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ye jo aapne mujhe bataya hai na ki ye Bhatia Trading establishment ye to already IndiaMART pe close hi hai ye. Ye active nahi hai sir IndiaMART par abhi.
Customer: IndiaMART pe to hai matlab main yu keh raha hu business close ho gaya hai iska GST number abhi suspend ho jayega abhi first pe set se wo first abhi December se.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan isko band kar rahe hain GST number band ho raha hai jo father hai na inka Ramesh Bhushan Bhatia ke naam se unki death ho gayi hai. Haan ji.
Customer: To business discontinued ho gaya hai ye wala.
Executive: Haan to ye to sir already IndiaMART pe pehle se hi disable hai ye account active hai hi nahi abhi. Ye already band chal raha hai.
Customer: IndiaMART pe to nahi hai par wo uske queries aa rahi hai na mail pe main yu keh raha hu. Accha accha wo queries pe wo hum contact karte hain to wo bolte hain bhai Bhatia trading se bills ye wo aa raha hai.
Executive: Accha theek hai theek hai sir main ek baar team se confirm karke then aapko respond karta hu theek hai aur sir ek cheez aur abhi meri call ke baad mein aapke paas ek feedback aayega please sir yes kar dijiyega wo meri call ke regarding hoga ki maine aapki call attend ki hai aapko attend kiya ya nahi kiya hai. Uske regarding hoga sir theek hai isko main is wale concern ko main close karwa deta hu. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Okay okay sir thank you thank you so much sir for your time.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close Bhatia Trading account.

- Receiving queries related to Bhatia Trading.



Resolution:

- Executive verified account details.

- Informed account is already disabled on IndiaMART.

- Assured to check on queries and respond.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm with team and respond.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account closure, disabled account, queries
